body:
Related:

- https://github.com/iterative/dvc/issues/10686

AFAIK this was supposed to be fixed ZFS 2.3.0, and is likely a bug in the filesystem. `ficlone` should either error or fully clone, so it should not raise this error later.

Yeah I'd like to dig into the underlying issue. In my brief investigation before I had to turn off bclone at the FS level it seemed like it was erroring at ficlone time and `cp --reflink=always` worked. Not sure if that gives any clarity.
